content.rendered: Dr Khondokar was graduated in Economics at Islamic University, Bangladesh. Then He achieved MSc in International Business Management and Ph.D. at the University of Gloucestershire, UK. His expertise is entrepreneurship and small business. He is currently working at Regent College London as a business lecturer. Khondokar taught HND business subjects. The key roles are teaching and assessment including formative and summative feedback & pastoral care. He is active in CPD. The latest achievement is IQA, level 4 assessment award in the UK. He has a record of presenting in the international conference, publishing research papers, and active in conducting action research. Some research paper publication is on a process in the ABS 3 star journal.
